column9: Take on the role of a blacksmith in the castle, create weapons and sell it to the soldiers , or the army of darkness will capture the last castle , which the darkness has not yet found but closer . - Early access - 10 types of weapons. 5 kinds of metal for objects. - 12 other items to create. Don't let the oven cool down. - Buy ore, fuel, food from the merchant. - Mine the ore yourself outside the castle walls. - Upgrade ovens-buy parts and assemble boilers. - Hire a miner to bring you ore. - Don't forget to sleep , eat , drink. - Hero levels and skills. - Customer jokes. - The Board on which you leave orders. - Fishing, you can not buy food, eat fish. - Sandbox mode to the story.

Get ready to put your skills and your mind to the test. Cubes of Death is played from a 3D grid view and has both a story mode and an arcade mode (with randomized settings). 6 skill levels include everything a beginner needs to get into the game, a more challanging mode for the quick-thinker and GOD-MODE, for those of you that really think you will be reincarnated as a box your life after this. The 6th mode is where you get to measure your skills with your friends, allowing you to customize a course entirely for your needs, using a seed to replay same map as your friend and compare your scores and times. In future settings we are implementing PvP as 1 on 1 and up to 4 players in a battle royale style where players compete for time capsules, one-time-use-weapons and re-usable traps. The story-mode will hopefully get a co-op mode in the middle of 2022 and after that, we will see what you, our player-base asks for. Our ears are here for you so please send us ideas for future releases, we want Cubes of Death to be fun, fastpaced and re-playable.

Step aboard the MV Wilhelm Gustloff, and immerse yourself in this atmospheric simulation on that fateful day of January 30th 1945 Step aboard the MV Wilhelm Gustloff, a German armed military transport ship that was sunk during World War 2 by multiple torpedo strikes from a Russian submarine. You take on the role of a passenger aboard this ship, and will relive its final moments, from the time it was struck until it slipped beneath the ocean to its watery grave. You will first handedly witness this liner's demise, and what happened on that fateful day of January 30th 1945. The sinking of the MV Wilhelm Gustloff has never been properly recreated, but now you can completely explore the exterior of the ship, and experience a historically accurate sinking.

About this Game Apocalyptic is zombie survival shooter video game. It reaches the quality you expect from a good experience while adhering to some of the aesthetic technical limits of older hardware. The game features a hand-crafted campaigns made by the developers. Keys Keys are around every map to unlock new areas and you may save at anytime hit walk on on of our checkpoints which will be shown by text. Checkpoints Checkpoints are reached when you make a lot of progress through each map and will be automatically saved but make sure you save when completing each level or it wont save and you will have to do it all over again from the checkpoint save. Common Infected [More will be added in DLC Packages] Common - Zombies and Explosive Zombies Developer Console Press ` or ~ to use and close the developer console cheat commands - type /help to access all commands HealthBox [Kit] Press E to heal Syringe Shot Syringes give you extra temp health and you also get extra acceleration when running. Inventory System You can store items in your inventory by pressing B Health Decay System You will lose health over 1000 hp Adding soon 1. 4 player Coop Campaign 2. 4V4 Versus mode [Casual & Competitive Ranked Mode [MMR based] ]
column28: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

column9: Derelict is a top down, sandbox shooter set in the far distant future. You have woken up from stasis long after the fall of humanity and must try to survive in this hostile galaxy. Luckily, thousands of years of human colonization have left countless derelict space craft, abandoned space stations and the crumbling remains of human settlements ripe for looting. Unfortunately the galaxy is not quite dead yet. Genetically modified organisms, hardened for hostile environments, ancient mechanoids with corrupt A.I, rival scavengers, and countless hordes of humans who succumbed to a genocidal nanite plague, infest the dark corners of mankind's broken legacy. Features: Derelict will not hold your hand. Nor will it take you to A&E and call your mum when you've raided a derelict full of millennia old, raging androids, armed only with a knife. (Okay it will a bit, but only because my testers made me put a tutorial in). - A wide range of hand crafted and randomly generated environments to explore. - Dozens of weapons, ships and equipment pieces to loot. - Multiple difficulties. From rogue light to rogueaaaAAAGH. - Hordes of enemies to gib. - NPC's to aid or end. - Grim Epitaphs. Seek out shrines lamenting your death for phat lewts. - State of the art 2D graphics with a customisable player character. Redux overhaul: The past year has been spent over-hauling the whole game. The Redux update brings the game closer to the original vision for the game. - Rebuilt from the ground up in game maker studio 2. - Full pad support and rebinding. - New derelicts, planets and a completely remade space environment. - New enemy types. - New weapon and inventory systems. - More grim Epitaphs. Totally non-biased quotes from people who've played during development: 'It's allright.' - Developers nephew. 'Pretty sure I had fun.' - Part time QA Tester Arpz. 'Looks like mario.' - Developers mum. 420/10 wpuld epitaph again. - Dr Tester, PhD Message from the Dev... The game has been a labor of love over the past 4 years since I drunkenly decided to try and make a game, it's been coded and designed in my spare time, and tested by my hardcore group of friends. The aim was to make a top down shooter where you weren't constrained to loading up arena's and just fighting waves, one where you actually felt a part of the world. I hope you like it.

Do you have secrets? Of course you do: everyone does. But how sinister are yours? You don't have to answer that one. We are, however, all curious sometimes what skeletons other people might have in their closets... The protagonist is Satou Ishida, an amnesiac student at the International Galactic University who embarks on a dark and thorny path to find answers to the burning questions regarding his friends, the college administration, and himself... Features: A dark narrative with comedic undertones Many choices that shape the outcome of the story Four possible love interests each with their own unique personality
column28: The game contains graphic scenes of violent and sexual nature, coarse language, and is unsuitable for the faint of heart and persons under the age of 18.

column9: This is where the fun begins! You were sent to a space mission few years ago to investigate a enemy base who were planning to attack your planet but you found nothing Now that you are back, you discover that your planet has been invaded by the enemy base you were looking for! So you have one Last Space Mission... kill those enemies and recover your planet! The game features 4 complete levels + 1 extra bosses only level that make a total of 80 + 4 waves! A shop with 3 different items and 3 different spaceship upgrades with 5 upgrade levels each! 21 different enemies including 4 bosses! More than 1.5 hours of gameplay!

column9: In this virtual reality game you are a wizard of incredible power tasked with defending a small village from hordes of monsters. Current Features Include Full Index Controller support with finger tracking Also supports htc vive controllers Four different spells that are cast using finger tracking (Also works with vive controllers) The ability of teleportation Four different monsters One village Several villagers And a bit of scenery

Epilepsy Warning If you are suffering from epilepsy, this game is probably not for you. This is due to the huge amount of bright stars, which can flicker and rotate around you. Description 'A Hole In Space' is a slow-paced space simulation game. You take control of a small black hole, which roams through an universe created by parameters you choose. The movement is slow and sluggish, because everything moves by forces. The time you need to accelerate is the same time you need to decelerate. Therefore, it is not advisable to try to fly with max speed. The amount of time you need to absorb the whole universe depends on how many stars you want in your universe. Your universe can have from 100 up to 10 million stars, but only if your PC can handle it. Goal The goal is to absorb the whole universe. 1. Absorb nearby suns to grow in mass. 2. Absorb other black holes in the universe, if you are greater in mass. 3. Absorb the rest of the universe through your new added huge mass. 4. Enjoy the Big Bang! You lost the game, if any black hole absorbs you. This will happen if you get to close to them with a lesser mass. Features Every universe is unique due to procedural generation. Nevertheless, use the seed to share your universe with others. You can create up to 100 galaxies in your universe and therefore up to 100 supermassive black holes in their center. The galaxies can either be static or dynamic, which means they either stay in place or attracting each other. The whole universe can contain up to 10 million stars, but only if your PC can handle it. You can turn the gravity of stars on or off. If this is off, the performance will drop linear with the amount of stars. Otherwise it will drop squared. Therefore the max amount of stars will be reduced to 100K. The stars can either start with zero velocity or with the first cosmic velocity, which means they will fly in an orbit around the center black hole. You can enable 'Spaghettification' to tear stars into smaller pieces. There are 7 Nebula backgrounds to choose from, which don't affect the simulation. There are 9 different galaxy forms to explore: Random, Circle, Cube, Octahedron, Sphere, Spiral-2-Arms, Spiral-4-Arms, Spiral-8-Arms, Star Switch between the player black hole and galaxy camera to get a greater view of the universe. Technical Aspect For this game I used Unity's Data Oriented Technology Stack (DOTS) and with it the Entity Component System (ECS), the C# Job System and the Burst compiler. However I did not use Unity physics. Instead I created my own, based on classical Newton mechanics, center of mass model, vector mathematics and the superposition principle. The more advanced Schwarzschild Metric is not implemented. For a stable collision detection and to avoid infinities, a maximum speed for all objects and a space boundary were implemented. So no star can be slingshotted into oblivion, which would otherwise lead to an unfinishable game. Epilog If you have any ideas, criticism, feedback or just found some bugs, let me know in the Steam forum. Last but not least, have fun and delight yourself in void!

Escape From the Depth is an interactive 3D horror game. You navigate through the submarine level trying to collect items to escape from a monster that roams the hallways of the submarine. The player is armed with a map and is told where to go and which items they will need to grab, all while trying to avoid the monster. Features Stealth Multiple endings Narrated story Stealth The player can crouch and peek between hallway to ensure that the monster is no lurking nearby. Multiple endings Near the end you are presented with two options. What you choose to interact with, will dictate what ending you will get. Narrated story The story is fully narrated. As the player collects the required items they need. The ships AI will indirectly reveal what happen to the ship and it crew members through conversation with the main character.

The Forest Cathedral is a first-person environmental thriller set on a remote island. Playing as scientist Rachel Carson, players will figure out why the island won’t let her leave. The game tells the reimagined story of the attempted silence of Rachel Carson leading up to her discoveries on the harmful pesticide known as DDT. Slowly uncover the effects of DDT in this dramatic reimagining of the story of Rachel Carson. Use advanced environmental technology to solve 2D/3D connected puzzles. In The Forest Cathedral, players will experience: Unique blend of 2D platforming and 3D exploration Dramatic reimagining of the story of Rachel Carson Meticulously crafted forested island to explore Fully voiced dialogue and narrative Enchanting original soundtrack

Today is the day The Antbassador will come, to speak words of peace with Her Majesty Queen Antoinette IV. The Kingdom of Antopia has finally grown accustomed to a life without war, and its people are willing to forge an alliance with their one-time foe. If The Antbassador is good and kind, he might well see their worlds connected. Take control of The Antbassador, a giant human finger with a tophat, as he makes his way through a bustling ant colony. His massive bulk makes him strong but unwieldy, and if you're not careful you're liable to squish your tiny hosts! You must use your prodigious digit to help the citizens of Antopia without causing an international incident! CONTROLS: Move the mouse to push yourself here and there. Click the mouse to curl your finger. FEATURES: 5 minutes of fumblecore finger fun! Dozens of NPCs to avoid squishing! Reused assets from Octodad: Dadliest Catch! One climactic duel for the kingdom! WHY DID WE MAKE THIS? Antbassador is part of Young Horses: Free Range, where we collect our smaller side projects and release them for free! Back in 2014 while freshly finished with Dadliest Catch, a portion of the Young Horses team decided to participate in the Ludum Dare game jam #30. The theme for the jam was 'Connected Worlds', which we interpreted fairly loosely. Over the course of 72 hours, we conceived and developed Antbassador using the Horsepower engine. To our delight, Antbassador took first place in the jam, scoring highly in innovation, humor, and fun! So give it a try! It's free, so there's only so disappointed you can be!

Witch Rise tells the story about a light hearted girl who loves learning about magic and was turned into a piglet by the Fallen Witch, a powerful sorcerer who once was beloved and respected but got her heart corrupted by her own greed. Play as a young girl in the quest for finding a way to get back to her old self again. In your journey you'll need to find the four magic staffs in order to have a chance to defeat the Fallen Witch who bewitched the girl! Fight many magical creatures and ancient guardians, while search for very powerful itens which will be really helpful along the way, in this magical themed FPS inspired by the classics and featuring a leveling system, metroidvania style exploration map and 2D sprites in a 3D environment. FEATURES - Travel through 4 different biomes; - Medieval fantasy inspired themes; - 2D pixelated graphics set on a 3D world; - A bunch of useful Items to find; - Simplified leveling system; - Open World with many alternative paths.

column9: The ultimate Evil Dead multiplayer experience is here… and it’s groovy! Step into the shoes of Ash Williams or his friends from the iconic Evil Dead franchise and work together in a game loaded with over-the-top co-op and PVP multiplayer action! Play as a team of four survivors, exploring, looting, managing your fear, and finding key items to seal the breach between worlds in a game inspired by all three original Evil Dead films as well as the STARZ original Ash vs Evil Dead television series. Iconic Characters - Play as characters from throughout the Evil Dead universe, including Ash, Scotty, Lord Arthur, Kelly Maxwell, & more, with new dialogue performed by Bruce Campbell & others! Play As Good or Evil - Fight for the forces of good or take control of the Kandarian Demon to hunt Ash & others while possessing Deadites, the environmental objects & more as you seek to swallow their souls! Off-the-Wall Visuals - Whether you’re tearing a Deadite in 2 with Ash's chainsaw hand or flying across the map as the Kandarian Demon, realistic visuals & physics-based gore brings the horror to life! This...Is My Boomstick - Brandish your double barrel shotgun, chainsaw, cleavers and more to do some delightfully gruesome violence against the armies of darkness. Splatter Royale - Choose Deadite versions of any Survivors and Demons from the game in this battle royale–style game mode. Use your wits and weapons to duke it out to the last person standing in fast-paced, cutthroat action for up to 40 players!
column12: “Exhilarating.....an absolute blast” 8/10 – IGN “Hail to the king of asymmetrical horror” 4/5 – Windows Central “A wicked, blood-soaked, supremely groovy good time” 4/5 – GamesRadar
column28: This game contains scenes of blood, violence and gore. Viewer discretion is advised.

column9: Arm Yourself! The Goblins Are Coming! Become the last line of defense to protect your lords treasure from unrelenting attacks from goblin hordes. In this action based tower defense style game protect your lords treasure chests from goblin raiders. Simple controls and easy to learn makes it easy to hop into and start racking up your highscore. Features: Easy Controls Escalating Difficulty Highscore Tracking Multiple Enemy Types

EternaMine is a game focused around mining, mining will earn you various different currencies which can be used to upgrade your gear and unlock various things. There's different mines to explore and tons of different ores to see. There's three different mine types in Eternamine: Standard mine - A standard 'square' mine that will refill once it's been mined out enough, good for beginner miners Deep mines - Strange mines that seems to go infinitely deep with better and better ores the further down you go. Some say there's treasure buried deep below... Dark mines - Magical mines that only open up every now and then, make sure you go in there when they do, because the treasures they hold are truly something else. Make sure your sword is in top shape though as you won't be alone in there... Your pickaxe is your most important tool in this world. It can be upgraded with tons of upgrades, some that will increase it's strength, speed, reach as well as lots of 'power' upgrades. Along with upgrading your pickaxe, it can also be pimped out with various skins and particle effect to make your mining adventure as flashy as possible The dungeons are areas where you can gain massive wealth if you're brave enough. With a dungeon key, you can enter a dungeon and take on the enemies that reside there, each defeated enemy will give you some rewards and after you have defeated a certain amount, the king of that dungeon will spawn... Make sure you're ready to take on a dungeon before entering it, as a key for that dungeon will be consumed every time you enter. Your sword is your most trusted companion alongside with your pickaxe. In order to defend yourself from the enemies in the dungeon and the dark mines, you will need a good and reliable sword. Your sword can be upgraded in various ways as well as pimped out with various skins and particle effects, everything to make your fighting as flashy as possible. In the world of Eternamine, there's lots of help to get from the various npc's in the world. All npcs have unique personalities and all help out in different ways. There's the shopkeeper, the pickaxe master, the dungeon master, the crate master, the mine master and many many others. The world of eternamine has lots and lots of different items to use and utilize to secure the biggest wealth you could imagine, items vary in rarity and can be obtained in various different ways. Some items can be opened for rewards, some will give you temporary buffs, others will help you clear out a mine quicker. Not only can you gain money and tokens in Eternamine, but the game has additional currencies. Gems are a more rare currency and can for example be used in the shop to buy rare items. For every level you gain in Eternamine, you gain a skill point which can be used in the game's skill tree for upgrades which are more powerful than the standard upgrades.

Flora Domina is a turn-based strategic card game where you play as a nature goddess that has to defend her island from humans. Use the power of nature to take back your land from the industrial invaders. Overgrow their mines and factories with flowers, grow forests and brambles to hold them off. You hold the humans off by expanding your territory and playing cards to grow your forests. The humans do the same by building homes, mines and factories. Overgrow the other to conquer them! Summer and winter come and go. With them they bring advantages and disadvantages to each side. Humans will need more coal in winter while your plants will need extra water in summer. Plan ahead and grow when the time is right! The island is procedurally generated every session. The landscape consists of different types. There are deserts, marshes, geysers and more to make growing on the island more interesting. Discover it and use it to your advantage! This game was developed by 3rd year students at Howest - Digital Arts & Entertainment during a period of 11 weeks.
column33: Dave Van Verdegem,Niels Bernaerdt,Artemy Belzer,Nioma Van Der Steen,Tom Legrand,Ken Redant,Sandra Nikolova

column9: THE COLONY HAS FALLEN! I mean, literally , the ant farm you call home has fallen off the table and smashed to pieces on the Living Room floor. What's worse: the Queen has gone missing in the chaos! Now leaderless and homeless, the ants of the farm are on the brink of starvation. As a brave worker ant, it's up to you to scour the unknown world of the Living Room for food. You'll explore the towering furniture, interact with the local ant population, and lay claim to all manner of delicious bug snacks! Do you have what it takes to become truly IndependANT? FEATURES: A small open world rich with detail! 4 delicious foods to find! 18 weird lil' ants to talk to! 20-30 minutes of gameplay, probably! WHY DID WE MAKE THIS? IndependANT is part of Young Horses: Free Range, where we collect our smaller side projects and release them for free! This game is a tech demo we made to help us get used to the Unreal 5 engine. It turned out well enough that we thought fans might enjoy playing it (but not so well that you might enjoy paying for it...) So give it a try! It's free, so there's only so disappointed you can be!

GRAB is a VR multiplayer parkour game. Climb, jump, slide and swing through the levels to reach the end, but don't fall or touch the lava! A core component of GRAB is the level editor that lets you and your friends create your own levels together and upload them for everyone else to play. Features: active and fun physics based controls Play with up to 10 players in cross platform multiplayer Built-in tutorial levels to get you started as well as some more advanced bigger levels Built-in level editor that lets you build levels together with your friends in multiplayer with quick switching between testing and editing Download levels made by the community and upload your own Over 150000 levels made by the community!
